original_text: Then the Lord put forth his hand, and touched my mouth. And the Lord said unto me, Behold, I have put my words in thy mouth.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 손을 내밀어 내 입에 대시며 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 보라 내가 내 말을 네 입에 두었노라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord put forth his hand
And the Lord said unto me
I have put my words in thy mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 말을 네 입에 두었노라
